title: Honor rewarded Icons
body:
Hello everyone, how are you. fine thank you!
OH MY GAH!
I got all 5 Icons as reward from the old honor system!
Took a screenie, no idea how to post pics, so yeah!
Big surprise as i did not know where i was at with my honor on the old system, prob common for a lot people to get them but it made me feel good regardless.
How did everyone else go with their icons?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Avago ya mug,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ENAcAnAo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-02T09:46:59.262+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/qPGqZYj.jpg  did this work? https://i.imgur.com/KuevoQj.jpg

OOPS sorry, its my chrome playing up!

It worked :DD
aww yea, got new tricks now!

> [{quoted}](name=Avago ya mug,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ENAcAnAo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-02T09:46:59.262+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/qPGqZYj.jpg  did this work? https://i.imgur.com/KuevoQj.jpg

Nope sorry! Try again :)

Congrats! 

You can embed an image by posting any web url that links to the image. So all you have to do is upload to a site like imgur and link it in your post

http://i.imgur.com/4CtjUZn.png

(the link you get when you right click and select "open image in new tab")
